Subjects: scripture, paraphrases of; sermons, verse in
_description: Burden or refrain and three couplets, based on Eccles. 17:21: ‘Convertere ad dominum et relinque peccata’

OxfMert248.First Lines:
Turn þe to vre louerdFor widerward so þu wlt
                    fle…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
… For al þat longeþ to þeoure louerd he wol
                    ȝiue it þeTurn þe etc.
